column2: (let* ((d (make-temp-file "neovm-del-dir-nonempty-" t)) (f (expand-file-name "child.txt" d))) (with-temp-buffer (insert "x") (write-region nil nil f)) (prog1 (condition-case err (list 'ok (delete-directory d) (file-exists-p d)) (error (list 'err (car err) (file-exists-p d)))) (delete-file f) (delete-directory d)))

(let* ((d (make-temp-file "neovm-del-dir-rec-" t)) (sub (expand-file-name "sub" d)) (f (expand-file-name "child.txt" sub))) (make-directory sub) (with-temp-buffer (insert "x") (write-region nil nil f)) (list (delete-directory d t) (file-exists-p d)))
